mapper.select: insert into T_EXCEPTION_TRADE select t1.SETTLE_DATE, t1.ZIP_FILE_NAME, t1.PID, t1.PSN, t1.TIM, t1.LCN, t1.FCN, t1.TF, t1.FEE, t1.BAL, t1.TT, t1.TAC from ${tableName} t1, ( select PID,PSN from ${errorTableName} where SETTLE_DATE=${date} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=${zipFileName} intersect select PID,PSN from ( select PID,PSN,count(1) c from ${tableName} WHERE SETTLE_DATE=${date} and ZIP_FILE_NAME=${zipFileName} group by PID,PSN ) where c > 1 ) t2 where t1.PID=t2.PID and t1.PSN=t2.PSN and t1.SETTLE_DATE=${date} and t1.ZIP_FILE_NAME=${zipFileName}
